title: SECRET OBSESSION Ending Explained | Crazy Ridiculous!
author: Think Story
comment: The director of this movie made 11 films last year so you know the quality is going to be excellent! 😂
Another plot hole. they never explained who's the "concerned party" dude that visit Jennifer at the hospital. Like, is he someone important or knows her? The world will never know.
Jennifer going to the kitchen and not grabbing a knife
How does the detective NOT pull up to the house with a squad of back up, knowing all the evidence he has on the fake husband???? Just one of my gripes lol
Major plot hole: she goes to sleep at night wearing a full face of makeup.
description:
In this video I take a look at Netflix's latest crazy thriller "Secret Obsession" and review its ending along with its many plot holes, inconsistencies, and hilarious moments.
